location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire to Messrs Essahy Johannes, Broker and Arrathoon Malchom, Linguist, to the British Residency

mods.abstract: The letter is informing the recipients that they are to be left in charge of the factory at Bushire during the Resident's planned trip to Shiraz. It includes instructions concerning their responsibilities, along with what to do if they receive any unexpected demands for cash, or encounter occurrences of an extraordinary nature.
